trans-unit.source: Manage the data products you want to offer to your consumers.

seg-source.mrk: Manage the data products you want to offer to your consumers.

target.mrk: 管理要提供给使用者的数据产品。

trans-unit.source: For each data set that you want make available to consumers in the <uicontrol>Data Marketplace</uicontrol> app, you create a data product. It contains data in an envelope with meaningful metadata which is displayed on the products detail page and is used for searching and browsing through the various data products.

seg-source.mrk: For each data set that you want make available to consumers in the <uicontrol>Data Marketplace</uicontrol> app, you create a data product.
It contains data in an envelope with meaningful metadata which is displayed on the products detail page and is used for searching and browsing through the various data products.

target.mrk: 对于你想在<uicontrol>数据市场</uicontrol>应用中提供给使用者的每个数据集，创建数据产品。
其中包含具有有意义元数据的封套中的数据，这些数据显示在产品详细信息页面上，用于搜索和浏览各种数据产品。

trans-unit.source: When you create a data product, most of the metadata and information you enter will be visible for consumers. It helps them to evaluate your data product and it can influence their buying decision.

seg-source.mrk: When you create a data product, most of the metadata and information you enter will be visible for consumers.
It helps them to evaluate your data product and it can influence their buying decision.

target.mrk: 创建数据产品时，输入的大多数元数据和信息将对使用者可见。
这些可以帮助他们评估数据产品，并影响他们的购买决定。

trans-unit.source: As a data provider, you decide on the pricing model for a data product: a data product can be either free of charge or require the purchase of a license at a certain cost. You also choose whether to ship your data products as one-time deliveries or as regularly updated versions.

seg-source.mrk: As a data provider, you decide on the pricing model for a data product: a data product can be either free of charge or require the purchase of a license at a certain cost.
You also choose whether to ship your data products as one-time deliveries or as regularly updated versions.

target.mrk: 作为数据提供商，你决定数据产品的定价模型：数据产品可以免费提供，也可以要求使用者付费购买许可证。
还可以选择是将数据产品一次性交付，还是作为定期更新版本传送。

trans-unit.source: Once you've created a data product, you list it to make it available to consumers.

seg-source.mrk: Once you've created a data product, you list it to make it available to consumers.

target.mrk: 创建数据产品后，可以将其上架，以供使用者查看。
